replies.body: I play Irelia mid who has no poke and little sustain and I beat most poke lanes. I say why not? He has everything you could want in mid. Just remember he is ad and if you have ad everywhere else he will be useless due too the armour the enemy will hopefully build too counter your team

> [{quoted}](name=Sethane,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=eMNM7KE0,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-01-20T05:51:51.781+0000)
>
> I play Irelia mid who has no poke and little sustain and I beat most poke lanes. I say why not? He has everything you could want in mid. Just remember he is ad and if you have ad everywhere else he will be useless due too the armour the enemy will hopefully build too counter your team

irelia has little sustain? how do you play her? do you know how her W works? she can take top lanes like a boss with her sustain.
It gets picked kinda often in high elo because it's one of those champs where if you don't know how to play against it then it's gonna snowball and win the game 1v5.
Yeah, why not. He still has gank potential. If you can face up against a lot of the common mid picks then do it.
Spellshield, Poke, Sustain, Tower Diving Potential 10/10. XD

That poke is so weak though. >__>
Mid laners can just auto-attack him and his spell shield costs a lot of mana, tower diving potential is pretty bad if you're the one poked.

> [{quoted}](name=Gorangutan,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=eMNM7KE0,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-01-19T12:00:49.078+0000)
>
> Spellshield, Poke, Sustain, Tower Diving Potential 10/10. XD

Ult to top and bottom to help out your team and get kills. I say do it.

Nocturne? is that a new champion?

in all seriousness, idk how mid would work because I haven't seen him in action since like 2012
